data.title: Food
data.text: They have good burgers and drinks.  The rest of the food is not that great.  I have tried their wings, ribs and several other dishes but would not have them again.

data.title: Good food, friendly fast service
data.text: This place is fun for small or larger groups. There is one pool table, it never seems overcrowded. It gets a little rowdy when they have karaoke night but it's fun. They dont have a huge menu but their home run nachos are great and their chicken tenders and fries are pretty good. Very accommodating with changing TV channels. Awesome place for food or drinks!

data.title: Average Ambiance, But The Food...
data.text:
The food. All I can say is it was so salty it was hard to eat.  We ordered a Philly Cheese Steak, and had to choose between swiss, jack, cheddar and american cheese.  We chose american, because hey, cheese steak should be melty, right? Fries came with, and those were also super salty.  The steak was like the steak-ums you buy at the supermarket. The green peppers and onions were mushy, and soaked in whatever passed for Au Jus here. We split the sandwich, and I could not finish my half.  I hate leaving bad reviews, but I had to.  

I give the food a 2 star, because I have actually had worse!  The service was good: Arta was right on point; paid attention, checked in often, and was very pleasant.  She gets 3.5 stars :)

data.title: Great service.  Lots of TVs
data.text: Stopped by on a whim.   Will go back for the Tiki Bar outside.  The service was great and this is a place I will go to watch football because there are ALOT of TVs.  I look forward to more experienced.

data.title: Nice Setup & Geared for your Sports Fix.
data.text: This is a nice local sports bar and grill that has enough TV's to cover any sporting event.  The Staff are friendly and provide great service.

data.title: The best rueben in town.
data.text: I have tried reubens in town, and out, and this if my favorite.  A great size sandwich with plenty of meat, cheese, and kraut.  It just plain tastes like a reuben should.  Good service

data.title: Great sports bar and restaurant
data.text: I had the PHILLY Steak sandwich and it was excellent. The service was also great. Nice place to wa ch sports also.

data.title: Stay home
data.text: Hubby had perch and seasoned fries, Fries didn't even taste like they had salt. Perch fillets looked like they were fried cardboard, run over by a car- they were so flat. He said it was horrible. The waitress never brought his cole slaw, that he asked for in place of the soup or salad offered. Buns and butter- kinda stale buns. I had fried cod, was pretty good, actually. Same fries, pretty bad. I had tea, waitress never came back with any more hot water. The small white mug I got with hot water probably held 6 oz. I had soup, clam chowder- tasted canned. I went into the bathroom, and it was really disgustingly dirty- no junk lying around, but like it hadn't been cleaned in 5 years. I don't recommend. Their gyros sandwiches are great tho-

data.title: Sports Sports Sports!!
data.text: Biggest sports bar in Oshkosh and the owner is very Friendly!Great food at reasonable prices.Downtown Oshkosh and a great party bar!

data.title: good
data.text: service was ok but food was good the chif came out to see how we like the food and i though that was cool i would eat their again for sure

data.title: Great sports bar
data.text: We had a great experience here. If you are stopping in, ask for Kaelee as your server, she was very engaged, enjoyed her job, and ensured that we were satisfied with our food and overall experience. There is a sand volleyball court in the back that looked like a lot of fun, in addition to a nice large area surrounding the bar for adequate game viewing. I was there in August, just before football started, but can imagine this place is hopping during football season!

data.title: Could be better
data.text: Has so much potential but so little to offer. Either needs new kitchen and waitress staff or needs new management. Food is alright, of you're drunk and hungry. If sober and hungry, go to the Roxy down the block...or even The fast food joint next door.  Food was cold, overpriced for the quality. Bad waiting staff. Never fully busy. Cool looking place with little to offer.

data.title: Sad, but American Table is closed; will reopen as a Sports Bar
data.text: Remodelling is now underway.  American Table was a friendly place to eat with Albanian touches on the menu.  We liked it for Sunday breakfast or lunch.  Sadly,  the owners decided that a sports bar would be better business and it is currently closed while undergoing remodeling.

data.title: I love this place!
data.text: Great family place. Big portions, wonderful owner, very reasonable prices. Homemade soup comes with every full meal. Always great soup choices. Owner even carried my colicky 6 week old around while we ate! Love the sandwiches - carved turkey in the Monte Cristo, steak sandwich with real steak... Have been going here for years, they always recognize the kids and we feel like part of the family.

data.title: They have a good Breakfast skillet
data.text: They have a good Breakfast skillet

data.title: nette Bar
data.text:
Wir sind hier zufällig zum Mittagessen reingefallen. Der Salat war sehr lecker und die Bedienung wirklich freundlich.
:-)
